attributes.action: Subsidise motorbike insurance in London for commuters.
attributes.additional_details:
Police are not catching them.
http://www.thunderous71.com/?p=3579

The Sun
https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/2346114/shocking-moment-superbike-theft-by-hammer-wielding-thugs-is-foiled-in-central-london/
attributes.background:
Motorbike theft is rising markedly in London and elsewhere in the UK, the capital seeing a 44% increase when comparing 2012 to 2014 data.
For example I can no longer get insurance on my motorbike as I live within the M25 and my bike is classed as a desirable bike to steal. It costs over 6k.
